name: CrossWord Puzzle
description:
Here in this game included all the country's flag images so that you can get to know about the country. It is an educational game that enhances your IQ.
Flags and Capitals of the World - the best education quiz ever! This is a simple trivia game to recognize the flags over the world. Flags Quiz Gallery:
Learn all the countries' flags of the world!

"Flags and capitals of the World ⛳️ Quiz" is a free game full of fun that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of countries flags from around the world ⛳️
How many world flags can you recognize?

Exercise your brain with puzzle games!

FEATURES
-Unlimited levels!
-helpful clues! New hints are granted for correct guesses.
-Rating options!
-Puzzles of varying difficulty!
- Frequent application updates!

This is an excellent and fun game for all students of world geography or are you a sports lover who needs help to recognize the flags of national teams? Find the National Flag of Your country!
